tr_quotes.quote: Sevgi, hatalısın yerine farklı hissediyorum demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yaptığınıza ve beraberinizdekine dikkatinizi hediye edin.
tr_quotes.author: Jim Rohn

tr_quotes.quote: Başkalarına davranış yolumuzla kaderimizi seçeriz.
tr_quotes.author: Wit

tr_quotes.quote: Bir insanın kendi varlığının farkına varabilmesi için,insanlarla ilişki içinde olması gerekiyordu.
tr_quotes.author: Maksim Gorki

tr_quotes.quote: Her kes kendisiyle daha iyi ilişki kurarsa,başkalarıyla olan ilişkileri de mükemmel olacaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Spencer Johnson

tr_quotes.quote: İlişkiye girmek kolay, ilişkiyi sürdürmek zordur.
tr_quotes.author: Chris Rock

tr_quotes.quote: İlişki içinde olan insan yalnız değildir;gönlü coşkun,yaşamı anlamlı,umutlu bir kişidir.
tr_quotes.author: Doğan Cüceloğlu

tr_quotes.quote: Başkalarıyla kurduğumuz ilişkiler her zaman kendimizle kurduğumuz ilişkilerin bir yansımasıdır
tr_quotes.author: Cesare Pavese

tr_quotes.quote: Sözler bittiğinde gözler ilişki kurar.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Her bakış gözlem,her gözlem düşüncə,her düşünce yeni ilişkiler ortaya çıkar.
tr_quotes.author: Recep Şükrü Apuhan

tr_quotes.quote: Bence bir kadınla erkek arasında kurulacak en iyi ilişki aşktır.Ama ne yazık ki sürdürülemiyor.
tr_quotes.author: Latife Tekin

tr_quotes.quote: Romantik ilişkiler,en iyi durumlarda bile oynaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Beth Harbison

tr_quotes.quote: Her yeni ilişki yeni sıkıntılar yaratır,en masumu bile.
tr_quotes.author: Oya Baydar

tr_quotes.quote: Bilirsiz, insanlar zorunluk karşısında nefret ettiği kimselerle de ilişki kurar.
tr_quotes.author: Dostoyevski

tr_quotes.quote: Her ilişki kendi tabiatında meyve verir.
tr_quotes.author: Sinan Yağmur

tr_quotes.quote: Sığ insanlar şansa inanır.Güçlü insanlar ise 'sebep ve sonuç' ilişkisine.
tr_quotes.author: Ralp Waldo Emerson

tr_quotes.quote: Para ve hayal gücü arasında ters bir ilişki vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Alan Moore

tr_quotes.quote: Canlı ve cansız tüm varlık birbiriyle görünmez bir ilişki içerisindedir.
tr_quotes.author: Sebuhi Quluzade

tr_quotes.quote: Kapitalizmde her ilişki çıkarlar üzerine kuruludur.Çıkarlar bitince ilişki de biter!
tr_quotes.author: Sebuhi Quluzade

tr_quotes.quote: Her suskunluk; bir iç kanamadır ilişkilerde.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İyi insan mutluluk, kötü insan tecrübe bırakır
tr_quotes.author: Lenz

tr_quotes.quote: Yanlış insan ders, doğru insan iz bırakır
tr_quotes.author: Lenz

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan anlamaya çalışacağına baskı kurar, ilişki kuracağına manipüle eder çünkü birisiyle ilişki kurmak büyük bir anlayış gerektirir.
tr_quotes.author: Osho

tr_quotes.quote: İyi dostluk ilişkileri sebepsiz kurulur. İhanet yoktur, güven vardır
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Biten bir aşkın hemen ardından bir başkasıyla başlayan şeyin adı ilişki değil, çelişkidir.
tr_quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

tr_quotes.quote: İlişki durumum; yeşil bağın üzümü, yola diktim gözümü. Ne gelen var ne giden, kime diyeyim sözümü.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sorun ilişki durumu değiştirecek birini bulmak değil, hayatını değiştirecek birini bulmak.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İçtenlikten uzak, asla sürekliliği olmayan insan ilişkileri. Hepsi yerin dibine batsın
tr_quotes.author: Franz Kafka

tr_quotes.quote: İlişki bir şeyleri paylaşabilmekti. Biz acıyı paylaşmıştık seninle.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bazı ilişkiler bittiğinde ayrıldım denmez, kurtuldum denir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Çıkar uğruna, menfaat bekleyişi içinde, belli kolaylıklardan veya imkanlardan yararlanmak hesabıyla, uygunsuz kişi veya guruplarla ilişkiye girmeyin.
tr_quotes.author: Sakıp Sabancı

tr_quotes.quote: Ey yalnızlık. Herkesin koynuna girip çıkarsın da, bir tek benimle mi düzenli bir ilişkin var?
tr_quotes.author: Ece Ayhan

tr_quotes.quote: Bir ilişkiyi kadın başlatır, kadın bitirir… Ama başlatan ve bitiren aynı kadın olmayabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Reha Muhtar

tr_quotes.quote: Kapitalizm de her ilişki çıkarlar üzerine kuruludur. Çıkarlar bitince, ilişki de biter!
tr_quotes.author: Sebuhi Quluzade

tr_quotes.quote: İlişki kendimizi olduğumuz gibi gördüğümüz bir aynadır.
tr_quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanları; kitaplar gibi düşünün. Ve kapaklarına bakıp aldanmayın. Asıl değerini okumaya başlayınca anlarsınız.
tr_quotes.author: Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: İlişkiler başladığı günden itibaren bitmeye doğru yol alırlar. Yani her ilişkinin bir son kullanma tarihi vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hiçbir kalp zorla elde edilmez.
tr_quotes.author: Moliere

tr_quotes.quote: İlişkilerin uzun süreli olması için güven ve saygının olması şarttır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bazı ilişkiler vardır insana işkence veren bazı ilişkiler vardır insana hayatı yaşatan.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İlişkilerde önemli olan arkadaşlıktır. Çünkü sadece seks için seks yapmanın, yüz yıkamaktan hiçbir farkı yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Sophia Loren

tr_quotes.quote: Gülümsemek, iki insan arasındaki en kısa mesafedir.
tr_quotes.author: Victor Borqe

tr_quotes.quote: Aşkı sıradan insanlar yaşar. Güzel olanlar, kendilerini sergilemek için çalışmaktan aşka zaman bulamazlar.
tr_quotes.author: Katherine Hepburn

tr_quotes.quote: Sevdiklerimize vereceğimiz en değerli hediye, ne altındır ne de mücehver. Yalnız kendimizden bir küçük parça.
tr_quotes.author: Emerson

tr_quotes.quote: Eşyalarınızı hazineleyin, mallarınızı değil.
tr_quotes.author: Anthony J D'Angelo

tr_quotes.quote: Başarılı bir ilişki birden çok kez aşık olmayı gerektirir, ancak her zaman aynı kişiyle.
tr_quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

tr_quotes.quote: Her ilişki içinizdeki bir gücü veya zayıflığı besler.
tr_quotes.author: Mike Murdock

tr_quotes.quote: Seni tanımadan yüz yıl yaşamaktan yarın ölmeyi tercih ederim.
tr_quotes.author: Pocahantas

tr_quotes.quote: Bir ilişkide istediğim üç şey: Ağlamayacak gözler, yalan söylemeyen dudaklar ve ölmeyecek aşk.
tr_quotes.author: Wiz Khalifa

tr_quotes.quote: Nezaket ve nezaket çok önemlidir. İlişkilerde, küçük şeyler büyük şeylerdir.
tr_quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

tr_quotes.quote: Beni her güldürdüğün zaman bir yıldıza uzanıp tutabilseydim. Bütün gökyüzü avucumun içinde olacaktı.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

en_quotes.quote: Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship
en_quotes.author: Buddha

en_quotes.quote: Who cares about the clouds when we're together? Just sing a song and bring the sunny weather
en_quotes.author: Dale Evans

en_quotes.quote: They do not love that do not show their love
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: There is no more lovely, friendly and charming relationship, communion or company than a good marriage
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther

en_quotes.quote: You've got to be in a bad relationship to really understand what a great one is
en_quotes.author: Steve Harvey

en_quotes.quote: I think for any relationship to be successful, there needs to be loving communication, appreciation, and understanding
en_quotes.author: Miranda Kerr

en_quotes.quote: There is no love without forgiveness, and there is no forgiveness without love
en_quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

en_quotes.quote: Treasure your relationships, not your possessions
en_quotes.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

en_quotes.quote: My relationship to plants becomes closer and closer. They make me quiet; I like to be in their company
en_quotes.author: Peter Zumthor

en_quotes.quote: Starbucks has a role and a meaningful relationship with people that is not only about the coffee
en_quotes.author: Howard Schultz

en_quotes.quote: Marriage is a commitment for life. It is a permanent, lifelong relationship
en_quotes.author: Dada Vaswani

en_quotes.quote: We don't develop courage by being happy every day. We develop it by surviving difficult times and challenging adversity
en_quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis

en_quotes.quote: If you love someone, set them free. If they come back they're yours; if they don't they never were
en_quotes.author: Richard Bach

en_quotes.quote: We are afraid to care too much, for fear that the other person does not care at all
en_quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: I think part of the beauty of our relationship with jewelry is that it can change and evolve as we do ourselves
en_quotes.author: Erika Christensen

en_quotes.quote: A people's relationship to their heritage is the same as the relationship of a child to its mother
en_quotes.author: John Henrik Clarke

en_quotes.quote: Love does not claim possession, but gives freedom
en_quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

en_quotes.quote: I feel so lucky to have both a son and a daughter, because there's a different relationship with each of them
en_quotes.author: Hugh Jackman

en_quotes.quote: Between men and women there is no friendship possible. There is passion, enmity, worship, love, but no friendship
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: Absences are a good influence in love and keep it bright and delicate
en_quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

en_quotes.quote: Love thou the rose, yet leave it on its stem
en_quotes.author: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

en_quotes.quote: The relationship between husband and wife should be one of closest friends
en_quotes.author: B. R. Ambedkar

en_quotes.quote: The better you know yourself, the better your relationship with the rest of the world
en_quotes.author: Toni Collette

en_quotes.quote: Parenting now is a two-way relationship where you learn from each other
en_quotes.author: Juhi Chawla

en_quotes.quote: Love sought is good, but given unsought, is better
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: To catch a husband is an art; to hold him is a job
en_quotes.author: Simone de Beauvoir

en_quotes.quote: A strong working relationship requires every participant to be on the same page
en_quotes.author: Dinesh Paliwal

en_quotes.quote: I think it matters whether someone has a good heart
en_quotes.author: Elon Musk

en_quotes.quote: I have a great relationship with my mother-in-law. We're both Leos, we understand each other
en_quotes.author: Tori Amos

en_quotes.quote: Look at an interview as an organic part of building a relationship
en_quotes.author: Caroline Ghosn

en_quotes.quote: There's going to be a symbiotic relationship between the edge and the cloud
en_quotes.author: Peter Levine

en_quotes.quote: Yet, taught by time, my heart has learned to glow for other's good, and melt at other's woe
en_quotes.author: Homer

en_quotes.quote: He who loves 50 people has 50 woes; he who loves no one has no woes
en_quotes.author: Buddha

en_quotes.quote: Every man sees in his relatives, and especially in his cousins, a series of grotesque caricatures of himself
en_quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

en_quotes.quote: I'm lucky in having found the perfect partner to spend my life with
en_quotes.author: Sara Paretsky

en_quotes.quote: Never above you. Never below you. Always beside you
en_quotes.author: Walter Winchell

en_quotes.quote: When you make the sacrifice in marriage, you're sacrificing not to each other but to unity in a relationship
en_quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

en_quotes.quote: I see when men love women. They give them but a little of their lives. But women when they love give everything
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: A positive self-image has little relationship to our material circumstances
en_quotes.author: Ezra Taft Benson

en_quotes.quote: Kids, adults, men, women, everybody has a relationship with Mickey Mouse
en_quotes.author: Warren Spector

en_quotes.quote: It's better to have loved and lost than to have to do forty pounds of laundry a week
en_quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

en_quotes.quote: The relationship between a Russian and a bottle of vodka is almost mystical
en_quotes.author: Richard Owen

en_quotes.quote: The relationship with time changes when you're captive
en_quotes.author: Ingrid Betancourt

en_quotes.quote: People love to hate. I have a love-hate relationship with the world. The world loves to hate me
en_quotes.author: Andy Dick

en_quotes.quote: People put so much effort into starting a relationship and so little effort into ending one
en_quotes.author: Marina Abramovic

en_quotes.quote: We must learn to regard people less in light of what they do or omit to do, and more in the light of what they suffer
en_quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

en_quotes.quote: You never lose by loving. You always lose by holding back
en_quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis

en_quotes.quote: Great salespeople are relationship builders who provide value and help their customers win
en_quotes.author: Jeffrey Gitomer

en_quotes.quote: In human relationships, kindness and lies are worth a thousand truths
en_quotes.author: Graham Greene

en_quotes.quote: It was just that we had this phenomenal honeymoon relationship that just kept on going
en_quotes.author: James Levine

en_quotes.quote: Even in high school, I went through a lot of relationship issues, and that's at the center of my music
en_quotes.author: Juice Wrld

en_quotes.quote: Falling in love and having a relationship are two different things
en_quotes.author: Keanu Reeves

en_quotes.quote: The loss of young first love is so painful that it borders on the ludicrous
en_quotes.author: Maya Angelou

en_quotes.quote: Friendship may, and often does, grow into love, but love never subsides into friendship
en_quotes.author: Lord Byron

en_quotes.quote: Lack of communication is the key to any successful relationship going wrong
en_quotes.author: Pepa

en_quotes.quote: The relationship between critic and writer is similar to the one between the pigeon and the statue
en_quotes.author: Ashwin Sanghi

en_quotes.quote: A relationship is based on communication
en_quotes.author: John Cena

en_quotes.quote: We have to bring children into a new relationship to food that connects them to culture and agriculture
en_quotes.author: Alice Waters

en_quotes.quote: However successful you are, there is no substitute for a close relationship. We all need them
en_quotes.author: Francesca Annis

en_quotes.quote: It takes bravery to end a relationship
en_quotes.author: Leona Lewis

en_quotes.quote: What love we've given, we'll have forever. What love we fail to give, will be lost for all eternity
en_quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

en_quotes.quote: Never too late to change your relationship with somebody in your life
en_quotes.author: Anderson Cooper

en_quotes.quote: Love is never lost. If not reciprocated, it will flow back and soften and purify the heart
en_quotes.author: Washington Irving

en_quotes.quote: The only time a woman really succeeds in changing a man is when he is a baby
en_quotes.author: Natalie Wood

en_quotes.quote: The reason for fasting is to understand the relationship between what's you and what's the accumulative body
en_quotes.author: Jaggi Vasudev

en_quotes.quote: Relationships based on obligation lack dignity
en_quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

en_quotes.quote: God is not looking for repayment, but repentance. What heals a broken relationship is sincere love and contrition
en_quotes.author: Frederica Mathewes-Green

en_quotes.quote: There is an inverse relationship between reliance on the state and self-reliance
en_quotes.author: William F. Buckley, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: I have a love / hate relationship with the city of New Orleans, which is the strongest kind of relationship
en_quotes.author: Nicolas Cage

en_quotes.quote: What students lack in school is an intellectual relationship or conversation with the teacher
en_quotes.author: William Glasser

en_quotes.quote: The heart of another is a dark forest, always, no matter how close it has been to one's own
en_quotes.author: Willa Cather

en_quotes.quote: It destroys one's nerves to be amiable every day to the same human being
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

en_quotes.quote: There is not love where there is no will
en_quotes.author: Indira Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: Remember that no relationship is a total waste of time. You can always learn something about yourself
en_quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: The power of community policing is in the relationship. This can happen only if an officer sticks around for a while
en_quotes.author: Greg Boyle

en_quotes.quote: I have a very close relationship with my daughter
en_quotes.author: Ron Cephas Jones

en_quotes.quote: I believe everyone has a soul mate that they can spend the rest of their life together
en_quotes.author: Ryan Lochte

en_quotes.quote: I'm very interested in the language of photography in relationship to painting
en_quotes.author: Catherine Opie

en_quotes.quote: Assuming if there's such a thing as reality, if you have a false relationship with it, how can you do anything but fail?
en_quotes.author: Jordan Peterson

en_quotes.quote: Women won't let me stay single and I won't let me stay married
en_quotes.author: Errol Flynn

en_quotes.quote: It is better to have a relationship with someone who cheats on you than with someone who does not flush the toilet
en_quotes.author: Uma Thurman

en_quotes.quote: The man is meant to be the alpha in the relationship on the money and power front
en_quotes.author: Jamie Dornan

en_quotes.quote: My relationship with M&S continues to be an exciting journey, from modelling to designing my online range
en_quotes.author: Twiggy

en_quotes.quote: I have a very bad relationship with mice
en_quotes.author: Casey Affleck

en_quotes.quote: You need to have a very strong relationship with your coaches. For me, Freddie Roach is like a father figure
en_quotes.author: Amir Khan

en_quotes.quote: When I was climbing, I built up a close relationship with the Sherpa people
en_quotes.author: Edmund Hillary

en_quotes.quote: I was born when you kissed me. I died when you left me. I lived a few weeks while you loved me
en_quotes.author: Humphrey Bogart

en_quotes.quote: I don't need anyone to rectify my existence. The most profound relationship we will ever have is the one with ourselves
en_quotes.author: Shirley MacLaine

en_quotes.quote: We cannot have that relationship if we only dictate or threaten and condemn those who disagree
en_quotes.author: Zbigniew Brzezinski

en_quotes.quote: Love casts out fear, but we have to get over the fear in order to get close enough to love them
en_quotes.author: Dorothy Day

en_quotes.quote: Androgyny is not trying to manage the relationship between the opposites; it is simply flowing between them
en_quotes.author: June Singer

en_quotes.quote: The most important things to do in the world are to get something to eat, something to drink and somebody to love you
en_quotes.author: Brendan Behan

en_quotes.quote: In a relationship you want to treat people the way you want to be treated
en_quotes.author: Bradley Cooper

en_quotes.quote: I think a lot of a man's outlook in life - at least mine - is shaped by his relationship with his father
en_quotes.author: Saif Ali Khan

en_quotes.quote: Some day, I'm in a horror movie, and some days I'm in, like, a sweet, independent feature about relationship
en_quotes.author: Hale Appleman

en_quotes.quote: When a woman is talking to you, listen to what she says with her eyes
en_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

en_quotes.quote: The heart is forever inexperienced
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: I think the relationship of indigenous people to their environment... that those were ethical omnivores
en_quotes.author: James Cromwell

en_quotes.quote: God gives us relatives; thank God, we can choose our friends
en_quotes.author: Addison Mizner

en_quotes.quote: I am single and not looking to be in a relationship
en_quotes.author: Chris Evans

en_quotes.quote: People change and forget to tell each other
en_quotes.author: Lillian Hellman

en_quotes.quote: No gentleman ever discusses any relationship with a lady
en_quotes.author: Keith Miller

en_quotes.quote: I have a great relationship with the Mexican people
en_quotes.author: Donald Trump

en_quotes.quote: All true meaning resides in the personal relationship to a phenomenon, what it means to you
en_quotes.author: Christopher McCandless

en_quotes.quote: It isn't necessary to have relatives in Kansas City in order to be unhappy
en_quotes.author: Groucho Marx

en_quotes.quote: Real intimacy is only possible to the degree that we can be honest about what we are doing and feeling
en_quotes.author: Joyce Brothers

en_quotes.quote: I just have a relationship with my imagination. It's like my friend, almost
en_quotes.author: Steven Wright

en_quotes.quote: If so many men, so many minds, certainly so many hearts, so many kinds of love
en_quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

en_quotes.quote: Contentment does not come from achievement. It comes from a relationship with the Lord
en_quotes.author: Paul Henderson

en_quotes.quote: The theme my generation explored was the relationship between capitalism and art
en_quotes.author: Takashi Murakami

en_quotes.quote: Don't smother each other. No one can grow in the shade
en_quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

en_quotes.quote: I love Neil Young. And he loves me! We have a great relationship
en_quotes.author: Donald Trump

en_quotes.quote: The behavior of men to the lower animals, and their behavior to each other, bear a constant relationship
en_quotes.author: Herbert Spencer

en_quotes.quote: I've always felt lonely, even if I'm in a great relationship or surrounded by my friends and family
en_quotes.author: Jenny Lewis

en_quotes.quote: It's a complicated relationship with a guitar. I love the Bullet, for sure
en_quotes.author: Laurent Brancowitz

en_quotes.quote: No relationship works without making an effort. That goes without saying. But you should never overcompensate
en_quotes.author: Sonam Kapoor

en_quotes.quote: I am not gay; I don't have a relationship with Ricky Martin
en_quotes.author: Maluma

en_quotes.quote: Men and women are not born inconstant: they are made so by their early amorous experiences
en_quotes.author: Andre Maurois

en_quotes.quote: When you're doing collaborative music, the relationship that forms is a very bonding kind of experience
en_quotes.author: Condoleezza Rice

en_quotes.quote: When I got my first television set, I stopped caring so much about having close relationships
en_quotes.author: Andy Warhol

en_quotes.quote: I honestly think being single's great. Being in a relationship's great. It's all about the timing
en_quotes.author: Mila Kunis

en_quotes.quote: We have a relationship with our customer, and that relationship translates into sales
en_quotes.author: Richard Hayne

en_quotes.quote: I'm more of an adventurous type than a relationship type
en_quotes.author: Bob Dylan

en_quotes.quote: Girls we love for what they are; young men for what they promise to be
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: Marriage destroyed my relationship with two wonderful men
en_quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

en_quotes.quote: Have you ever loved somebody, loved her completely, but had to end the relationship for life reasons?
en_quotes.author: John Mayer

en_quotes.quote: I have a fantastic relationship with money. I use it to buy my freedom
en_quotes.author: Gianni Versace

en_quotes.quote: A relationship isn't going to make me survive. It's the cherry on top
en_quotes.author: Jennifer Aniston

en_quotes.quote: We can improve our relationships with others by leaps and bounds if we become encouragers instead of critics
en_quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

en_quotes.quote: God and I have a great relationship, but we both see other people
en_quotes.author: Dolly Parton

en_quotes.quote: Well, a girlfriend once told me never to fight with anybody you don't love
en_quotes.author: Jack Nicholson

en_quotes.quote: It takes one person to forgive, it takes two people to be reunited
en_quotes.author: Lewis B. Smedes

en_quotes.quote: There is no substitute for the comfort supplied by the utterly taken-for-granted relationship
en_quotes.author: Iris Murdoch

en_quotes.quote: I want a man who's kind and understanding. Is that too much to ask of a millionaire?
en_quotes.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

en_quotes.quote: The relationship between talent and management is uneasy, at best
en_quotes.author: Jessica Savitch

en_quotes.quote: Real relationship is gritty and earthy, the stuff that life is made of
en_quotes.author: Amy Grant

en_quotes.quote: I don't really know how to relate to a long-term day-in day-out kind of comfortable relationship
en_quotes.author: Diane Lane

en_quotes.quote: What does it matter how many lovers you have if none of them gives you the universe?
en_quotes.author: Jacques Lacan

en_quotes.quote: The biggest mistake is believing there is one right way to listen, to talk, to have a conversation - or a relationship
en_quotes.author: Deborah Tannen

en_quotes.quote: Everyone talks about building a relationship with your customer. I think you build one with your employees first
en_quotes.author: Angela Ahrendts

en_quotes.quote: When a person goes into a relationship emotionally needy, they are not going to have discernment in choosing people
en_quotes.author: Jennifer O'Neill

en_quotes.quote: There is a positive and personal relationship between the Egyptian people and the Syrian people
en_quotes.author: Mohammed Morsi

en_quotes.quote: I feel like sarcasm is important in a relationship
en_quotes.author: Matt Lanter

en_quotes.quote: I would never put my close friends or a real relationship on a show
en_quotes.author: Kristin Cavallari

en_quotes.quote: The military has a very long relationship with Hollywood that dates back to the silent film era
en_quotes.author: Nick Turse

en_quotes.quote: Absence diminishes mediocre passions and increases great ones, as the wind extinguishes candles and fans fires
en_quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

en_quotes.quote: God is more interested in your future and your relationships than you are
en_quotes.author: Billy Graham

en_quotes.quote: I kept a very full diary of my relationship with Nixon, for some strange reason, until he became president
en_quotes.author: Billy Graham

en_quotes.quote: What surprises me most about God is that the creator of the universe should want a relationship with me
en_quotes.author: Rick Warren

en_quotes.quote: It is always the same: women bedeck themselves with jewels and furs, and men with wit and quotations
en_quotes.author: Maurice Chevalier

en_quotes.quote: I have to be in a relationship in order to be intimate. I'm not the one-night-stand kind of girl. Despite the rumors
en_quotes.author: Kim Kardashian

en_quotes.quote: Care is a state in which something does matter; it is the source of human tenderness
en_quotes.author: Rollo May

en_quotes.quote: To marry unequally is to suffer equally
en_quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

en_quotes.quote: I'm not a relationship expert. I'm an expert on manhood
en_quotes.author: Steve Harvey

en_quotes.quote: The most important thing as a leader is your relationship with God
en_quotes.author: Manny Pacquiao

en_quotes.quote: The one who loves the least, controls the relationship
en_quotes.author: Robert Anthony

en_quotes.quote: I have my relationship with God and myself, and that's what matters to me. I really don't care what most people think
en_quotes.author: Britney Spears

en_quotes.quote: I'm 31 now. I think I'm beginning to understand what life is, what romance is, and what a relationship means
en_quotes.author: Adam Sandler

en_quotes.quote: I've always had a very positive relationship with the municipal labor unions - a respectful relationship
en_quotes.author: Bill de Blasio

en_quotes.quote: I mean... in life... what relationship is easy?
en_quotes.author: The Weeknd

en_quotes.quote: I have a strange relationship with time. I'm not aware of it passing
en_quotes.author: Daniel Day-Lewis

en_quotes.quote: The relationship between the imagined and the real is more complicated than people imagine
en_quotes.author: Siri Hustvedt

en_quotes.quote: It's about strengthening the relationship and the bond of parent to child
en_quotes.author: Blair Underwood

en_quotes.quote: I have a love/hate relationship with jogging
en_quotes.author: Lisa Lutz

en_quotes.quote: If your social media addiction comes between your relationship, you might want to quit
en_quotes.author: Retta

en_quotes.quote: Two things I take very seriously in life. My golf game and my relationship with God. Neither one is simple
en_quotes.author: Cheryl Ladd

en_quotes.quote: I am particularly interested in creating a relationship between ideas of reception in conceptual art and theater
en_quotes.author: Tim Crouch

en_quotes.quote: Money creates a power relationship between the payer and the payee
en_quotes.author: Joichi Ito

en_quotes.quote: It is only when we no longer compulsively need someone that we can have a real relationship with them
en_quotes.author: Anthony Storr

en_quotes.quote: I've definitely had those moments when I think a relationship with somebody is one way, and then it just flips
en_quotes.author: Yael Stone

en_quotes.quote: I mean, we're really making a quantum change in our relationship to the plant world with genetic modification
en_quotes.author: Michael Pollan

en_quotes.quote: A relationship can give you a gut wrenching feeling sometimes. It's a real emotional ride
en_quotes.author: Drake

en_quotes.quote: In a relationship each person should support the other; they should lift each other up
en_quotes.author: Taylor Swift

en_quotes.quote: I can imagine it's hard to make a relationship last. I wouldn't know
en_quotes.author: Taylor Swift

en_quotes.quote: If I think too hard about a relationship, I'll talk myself out of it
en_quotes.author: Taylor Swift

en_quotes.quote: I have a much better relationship with the press than I did, I think because I stood my ground
en_quotes.author: Elton John

en_quotes.quote: Ultimately, who you choose to be in a relationship with and what you do in your bedroom is your business
en_quotes.author: Eminem

en_quotes.quote: You can't change anyone else, but people do change in relationship to your change
en_quotes.author: Jack Canfield

en_quotes.quote: Assumptions are the termites of relationships
en_quotes.author: Henry Winkler

en_quotes.quote: Films have never shown the kind of relationship that can exist between two women
en_quotes.author: Brigitte Bardot

en_quotes.quote: Every single person in my life and every relationship I have is distant because all I do is music
en_quotes.author: Mac Miller

en_quotes.quote: Your relationship to food is but a reflection of your relationship to yourself, as is everything in your life
en_quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

en_quotes.quote: The test of one's behavior pattern is their relationship to society, relationship to work and relationship to sex
en_quotes.author: Alfred Adler

en_quotes.quote: I had a very unhealthy relationship with food that turned into bulimia
en_quotes.author: Candace Cameron Bure

en_quotes.quote: And it was a very, very fruitful and great relationship between the Stones and The Beatles. It was very, very friendly
en_quotes.author: Keith Richards

en_quotes.quote: I'm not really a relationship expert but... I'm an expert on manhood and what men think
en_quotes.author: Steve Harvey

en_quotes.quote: I don't want to have a relationship with someone if I'm not going to work with them
en_quotes.author: Bill Murray

en_quotes.quote: When I work, my first relationship with people is professional
en_quotes.author: Bill Murray

en_quotes.quote: My relationship with everyone in Jamaica is good
en_quotes.author: Usain Bolt

en_quotes.quote: Every relationship I've been in, I've overwhelmed the girl. They just can't handle all the love
en_quotes.author: Justin Timberlake

en_quotes.quote: When a relationship doesn't work anymore, it's terrible to stay with someone that you don't love
en_quotes.author: Monica Bellucci

en_quotes.quote: It is a beautiful thing to work on your relationship
en_quotes.author: Jurnee Smollett-Bell

en_quotes.quote: When you're in a relationship you want it to work. My parents did, I did. But we are not taught how to make it work
en_quotes.author: Erykah Badu

en_quotes.quote: Ultimately, we wish the joy of perfect union with the person we love
en_quotes.author: Mortimer Adler

en_quotes.quote: Men and women have strengths that complement each other
en_quotes.author: Edwin Louis Cole

en_quotes.quote: I always knew I had a relationship with God. But I wasn't sure God had a relationship with me
en_quotes.author: Prince

en_quotes.quote: Religion is not man's relationship to God, it is man's relationship to man
en_quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

en_quotes.quote: I'm done with men... I'm going to be alone. I have no luck with relationships. I don't think I'm made for marriage
en_quotes.author: Halle Berry

en_quotes.quote: Like cars, every relationship requires a bit of an occasional service, and fine-tuning should be compulsory
en_quotes.author: Mariella Frostrup

en_quotes.quote: I have a lot of guy-like quintessential relationship qualities that I have had to work on
en_quotes.author: Solange Knowles

en_quotes.quote: I have a love-hate relationship with the Grammys because I don't see the music world as a competitive sport
en_quotes.author: James Taylor

en_quotes.quote: Before machines the only form of entertainment people really had was relationships
en_quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

en_quotes.quote: I believe the relationship you have with your government is not so different to a love relationship
en_quotes.author: Jill Scott

en_quotes.quote: A sensible woman should be guided by her head when taking a husband, and by her heart when taking a lover
en_quotes.author: Ninon de L'Enclos

en_quotes.quote: My relationship with food is intimate. I don't eat and tell
en_quotes.author: CeeLo Green

en_quotes.quote: I don't want to be married to someone who feels inferior to my success or because I make more money than he does
en_quotes.author: Grace Kelly

en_quotes.quote: Once a woman has forgiven her man, she must not reheat his sins for breakfast
en_quotes.author: Marlene Dietrich

en_quotes.quote: When Tony was madly in love with me, his relationship with Vanessa Redgrave was ending
en_quotes.author: Jeanne Moreau

en_quotes.quote: The man as he converses is the lover; silent, he is the husband
en_quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

en_quotes.quote: I have the same relationship with all my team-mates. For me, all my team-mates are the same
en_quotes.author: Edinson Cavani

en_quotes.quote: What defines a relationship is the work that's involved to maintain it, and it's constantly changing
en_quotes.author: Neil Patrick Harris

en_quotes.quote: Relationships can be very traumatic. But being in a healthy relationship can be very empowering
en_quotes.author: Kangana Ranaut

en_quotes.quote: If a relationship is founded on love it doesn't end
en_quotes.author: Rosanne Cash

en_quotes.quote: I have a love/hate relationship with my height - I am 6 ft. 4 in
en_quotes.author: John Lithgow

en_quotes.quote: Our relationship to the computer is much like our relationship to the car: rich, complex, socially messy
en_quotes.author: Ellen Ullman

en_quotes.quote: My father and I never really achieved a real relationship. We probably saw each other 20 or 25 times in our lifetime
en_quotes.author: Jean-Michel Jarre

en_quotes.quote: The main thing experience has taught me is that one has to sort of hone their relationship to time, you know
en_quotes.author: John Frusciante

en_quotes.quote: We had a strong relationship with Walter Brown, and felt that he was the best owner in the league
en_quotes.author: Bob Cousy

en_quotes.quote: I'm a very private person, and I never felt the need to speak about my relationship in public
en_quotes.author: Naga Chaitanya

en_quotes.quote: It's a human right to be able to have a relationship
en_quotes.author: Nina Hagen

en_quotes.quote: At first we got along real well. Now... it's pretty much just a professional relationship
en_quotes.author: Jose Carreras

en_quotes.quote: The things I write are for those who are willing to accept a new relationship between the reader and the author
en_quotes.author: Jerzy Kosinski

en_quotes.quote: You should only be in a relationship if it adds to your life
en_quotes.author: Jesse Metcalfe

en_quotes.quote: I have had a love-hate relationship with my body
en_quotes.author: Demi Moore

en_quotes.quote: The only time a relationship is good is when you really love them
en_quotes.author: Leighton Meester

en_quotes.quote: My relationship with fashion is playful and very expressive of what I'm feeling at the time
en_quotes.author: Phoebe Philo

en_quotes.quote: Women still remember the first kiss after men have forgotten the last
en_quotes.author: Remy de Gourmont

en_quotes.quote: I think a young woman's relationship with her father is really important
en_quotes.author: Candace Bushnell

en_quotes.quote: It's a complicated relationship with the place one grows up in, particularly if it's Northern Ireland
en_quotes.author: James Nesbitt

en_quotes.quote: Whenever a relationship doesn't go on the right path, it affects me in some form, but it hasn't spoilt anything for me
en_quotes.author: Vicky Kaushal

en_quotes.quote: To me, the ideal artist-to-audience relationship is a one-to-zero relationship. The artist should be granted anonymity
en_quotes.author: Glenn Gould

en_quotes.quote: It's harder than it looks to juggle all those things: relationship, movies, YouTube
en_quotes.author: Kian Lawley

en_quotes.quote: I have a great relationship with my parents. I have not been on lithium
en_quotes.author: Zach Braff

en_quotes.quote: I actually believe that the basis of a good relationship isn't liking the same things, it's hating the same things
en_quotes.author: Bobcat Goldthwait

en_quotes.quote: A grandchild is a miracle, but a renewed relationship with your own children is even a greater one
en_quotes.author: T. Berry Brazelton

en_quotes.quote: Politics is a love-hate relationship. I sure know that
en_quotes.author: Richard Lamm

en_quotes.quote: The doctor-patient relationship is critical to the placebo effect
en_quotes.author: Irving Kirsch

en_quotes.quote: Every relationship stands on its own, and it's successful or not successful for its own reason
en_quotes.author: Jordan Rodgers

en_quotes.quote: It's about a father and daughter and the daughter's friend and her relationship with her current husband
en_quotes.author: Ismail Merchant

en_quotes.quote: It is almost always a fault of one who loves not to realize when he ceases to be loved
en_quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

en_quotes.quote: Never assume that the guy understands that you and he have a relationship
en_quotes.author: Dave Barry

en_quotes.quote: I present myself to you in a form suitable to the relationship I wish to achieve with you
en_quotes.author: Luigi Pirandello

en_quotes.quote: Kindness in women, not their beauteous looks, shall win my love
en_quotes.author: Washington Irving

en_quotes.quote: When people say 'marriage' to me... It's always a means to an end. Everyone's so in a rush to define the relationship
en_quotes.author: Lady Gaga

en_quotes.quote: I think every relationship is going to go through a few rough patches. Those are what make it stronger, I think
en_quotes.author: Ryan Reynolds

en_quotes.quote: There is a myth that those who do humanitarian work have a saviour mentality, but the relationship is reciprocal
en_quotes.author: Meghan Markle

en_quotes.quote: A father-son relationship is strong, like no other teammates. You could be straightforward with one another
en_quotes.author: Mario Andretti

en_quotes.quote: I felt a tremendous sadness for men who can't deal with a woman of their own age
en_quotes.author: Michael Caine

en_quotes.quote: I think a good relationship is about collaboration
en_quotes.author: Jennifer Aniston

en_quotes.quote: No partner in a love relationship... should feel that he has to give up an essential part of himself to make it viable
en_quotes.author: May Sarton

en_quotes.quote: I've stepped more into my womanhood, I'm a mother now, I'm having a beautiful relationship as a wife and as a friend
en_quotes.author: Alicia Keys

en_quotes.quote: The goal is not to get into a relationship; the goal is to be in a relationship
en_quotes.author: Ashton Kutcher

en_quotes.quote: Having even just one relationship with an online influencer can have a significant impact on your business
en_quotes.author: Lewis Howes

en_quotes.quote: Be honest, brutally honest. That is what's going to maintain relationships
en_quotes.author: Lauryn Hill

en_quotes.quote: I can't even find someone for a platonic relationship, much less the kind where someone wants to see me naked
en_quotes.author: Gilbert Gottfried

en_quotes.quote: The customer is a remarkably selfish person: He takes the relationship to where the execution is in his favor
en_quotes.author: Azim Premji

en_quotes.quote: The easiest kind of relationship for me is with ten thousand people. The hardest is with one
en_quotes.author: Joan Baez

en_quotes.quote: It's been my desire to support efforts to aim at healing the relationship between law enforcement and the community
en_quotes.author: Doug Baldwin

en_quotes.quote: I think the most important thing for me in a relationship is honesty
en_quotes.author: Zac Efron

en_quotes.quote: I had a really complicated relationship with acting for a long time
en_quotes.author: Cole Sprouse

en_quotes.quote: Men should only believe half of what women say. But which half?
en_quotes.author: Jean Giraudoux

en_quotes.quote: We cannot really love anyone with with whom we never laugh
en_quotes.author: Agnes Repplier

en_quotes.quote: In any kid's relationship with their parents, there's always an influence there. You always want to do them proud
en_quotes.author: Colin Morgan

en_quotes.quote: I've had a relationship, a good relationship, with MTV for a long time, and I'd like to maintain that
en_quotes.author: Nia Peeples

en_quotes.quote: Everybody needs somebody
en_quotes.author: Mahalia Jackson

en_quotes.quote: In any relationship, after the first year is over, you can't help but want your own space
en_quotes.author: Helena Bonham Carter

en_quotes.quote: I have a love-hate relationship with performing
en_quotes.author: Sarah Brightman

en_quotes.quote: Being flirty is a way of letting a guy know you're interested without making a fool out of yourself
en_quotes.author: Carmen Electra

en_quotes.quote: When you make his sandwiches, put a sexy or loving note in his lunch box
en_quotes.author: Anne Rice

en_quotes.quote: In a relationship you have to open yourself up
en_quotes.author: Neil LaBute

en_quotes.quote: Do you know that other than my father, I've never had a man take care of me?
en_quotes.author: Dionne Warwick

en_quotes.quote: You show your vulnerability through relationships, and those feelings are your soft spot. You need to have a soft spot
en_quotes.author: Victoria Pratt

en_quotes.quote: A relationship is like another job, you know, you have to work at it all the time
en_quotes.author: Candice Swanepoel

en_quotes.quote: I left in Liverpool a lot of friends. I have a very good relationship with all of them
en_quotes.author: Fernando Torres

en_quotes.quote: I think it's healthy for couples to be away from each other for short periods
en_quotes.author: Liv Tyler

en_quotes.quote: The true test of a relationship is traveling together
en_quotes.author: Julia Stiles

en_quotes.quote: Maybe the most that you can expect from a relationship that goes bad is to come out of it with a few good songs
en_quotes.author: Marianne Faithfull

en_quotes.quote: Caesar might have married Cleopatra, but he had a wife at home. There's always something
en_quotes.author: Will Cuppy

en_quotes.quote: You have to knock doors, make calls, and build a relationship with voters long before Election Day
en_quotes.author: Keith Ellison

en_quotes.quote: The relationship between East and West needs to be and can be fixed via pop culture
en_quotes.author: Wang Leehom

en_quotes.quote: I don't think it's necessarily healthy to go into relationships as a needy person. Better to go in with a full deck
en_quotes.author: Anjelica Huston

en_quotes.quote: I don't even like to use the word relationship. I don't know what it means
en_quotes.author: Ron Silver

en_quotes.quote: A relationship requires a lot of work and commitment
en_quotes.author: Greta Scacchi

en_quotes.quote: That common cold of the male psyche, fear of commitment
en_quotes.author: Richard Schickel
